name: SmartOnFhirCodes
title: SMART on FHIR terminology.
description: Codes used to in profiles related to SMART on FHIR.

concept.display: Launch application using the SMART EHR launch
concept.definition: The task suggest launching an application using the SMART on FHIR EHR launch.

concept.display: Launch application using the SMART standalone launch
concept.definition: The task suggest launching an application using the SMART on FHIR standalone launch.
The URL of a SMART on FHIR application.

concept.display: Application context related to this launch.
concept.definition: The application context (appContext) to be passed to the application after launch.
